## About the Project

*Covid-19 Breakdown*

This project analyses Covid-19 data from Covid Act Now to determine the effectiveness of vaccines in the United States of America.

## Goals
* Determine if vaccinations are directly related with the reduction of Covid-19 cases in the USA
* Calculate how many vaccines are necessary to reduce the effect of Covid-19 on the USA
  + This may be challenging to prove only using graphs, formulas may be necessary
